text: O nay! Cac nguoi la nhung nguoi thuong xot chung nhung chung khong thuong xot cac nguoi, va cac nguoi tin tuong toan bo Kinh Sach (Qur'an). Va khi gap cac nguoi, chung bao: “Chung toi tin tuong.” Nhung khi o rieng ra thi chung phat gian cac nguoi đen noi đa ham huc can nhung đau ngon tay cua chung. Hay bao ho (hoi Muhammad!): “Tuc lam thi hay chet đi!”. Qua that, Allah biet đieu (bi an) nam trong long (cua chung)
